name: Gaiun of the Souten Kicks
text:
2 "Souten" monsters
If a "Souten" Fusion Monster(s) you control would be destroyed by card effect, you can destroy 1 other "Souten" monster you control instead. During the Main Phase, if you control a "Souten" Fusion Monster that was Fusion Summoned using an Effect Monster(s) as material (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Gaiun of the Souten Kicks" once per turn.
